All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BoxingController
The BoxingController class manages the communication between the model and view of the boxing application.
boxingGUI
Provides a GUI interface.
Category
The Category enum represents different categories.
CompetitorList
The CompetitorList class represents a list of competitors in a competition.
KABoxer
Abstract class representing a KABoxer in a boxing competition.
Level
The Level enum represents different skill levels.
Manager
The Manager class initializes the CompetitorList model, the boxingGUI view, and the BoxingController controller.
NoviceBoxer
The NoviceBoxer class represents a novice boxer, extending the KABoxer class.
Person
The `Person` class represents an individual with personal details such as name, middle name, surname, country, age, and gender.
ProfessionalBoxer
Represents a professional boxer, extending the base KABoxer class.
Staff
The Staff class represents a staff member in the system, including their personal details and access level.
